EmailTemplate.name: Valentine's Day 2022
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Valentine's Day!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
*** Wishing you a happy Valentine's Day from all of us at RIMOWA. *** For Valentine's Day, discover how to make it even more memorable with a curated selection of designs for you and your loved ones. Best,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
